it.polimi.se2019.server.games

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.games.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used by te server tu manager multiple games. It's capable of creating new games for the players waiting in queue for the start of a new match; saving the state the ames on the disck and much more. Check out the documentation of each method for a full overview of what this class does.
    Author:
    Federico Ferri

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GameManager.AlreadyPlayingException
      This exception should be thrown when a player that is already playing or is already in a waiting list tries to join a game or a waiting list.
      class  GameManager.GameNotFoundException
      This exception is thrown when the GmaeManager is unable to retrive a game.
      class  GameManager.IsClientAlive
      The pinger daemon is a very classical ping pong mechanism to check if a client is alive.
      class  GameManager.Tuple
      This class create an association between an commandHandler object and a userData object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameManager()
      This constructor builds an empty GameManager object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameManager

        public GameManager()
        This constructor builds an empty GameManager object.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String dumpName)
        This is the real magic, it initializes the game manager by loading the settings from file and by loading the saved games from disk. Loading takes a few lines due to the complex recreation of the observer/observable pattern that gets destroyed during serialization
        Parameters:
        dumpName - its the name of the dump file

      • dumpToFile

        public void dumpToFile(Game game)
        Serialize and dump the selected game to file.
        Parameters:
        game - the game that needs to be dumped

      • dumpToFile

        public void dumpToFile(Game game,
                       boolean deleteGame)
        Serialize and dump the selected game to file.
        Parameters:
        game - the game that needs to be dumped
        deleteGame - if true the selected game will be dumped and removed from the GameManager

      • isUserInWaitingList

        public boolean isUserInWaitingList(java.lang.String nickname)
        Check if the selected player is in the waiting list.
        Parameters:
        nickname - the nickname of the player that needs to be found in the waiting list
        Returns:
        true if a player with the selected nickname is in waiting list, false otherwise

      • isUserInGameList

        public boolean isUserInGameList(java.lang.String nickname)
        Check if the selected player is playing in some game.
        Parameters:
        nickname - the nickname of the player that needs to be found
        Returns:
        true if a player with the selected nickname is playing in some game, false otherwise

      • retrieveGame

        public Game retrieveGame(java.lang.String nickname)
                  throws GameManager.GameNotFoundException
        Get the game where the player with the selected nickname is playing.
        Parameters:
        nickname - the nickname of the player
        Returns:
        the game where the player with the selected nickname is playing
        Throws:
        GameManager.GameNotFoundException - the is no player with the selected nickname in any game

      • createGame

        public void createGame()
                throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Create a new game for the players in the waiting list. Starting with just a small set of Player objects this method is able to add a new game and also register correctly the observers needed to run a game.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - thrown if the waiting list contains more than five players

      • terminateGame

        public void terminateGame(Game game)
        This method notifies players that the game is terminating and removes the game from the list of games.
        Parameters:
        game - the game that will be terminated

      • startPingDaemon

        public void startPingDaemon(java.lang.String nickname,
                            CommandHandler commandHandler)
        Start a ping daemon for the new user.
        Parameters:
        nickname - name of the player that needs the ping daemon
        commandHandler - command handler of the player

      • addUserToWaitingList

        public void addUserToWaitingList(UserData newUser,
                                 CommandHandler currentCommandHandler)
                          throws GameManager.AlreadyPlayingException,
                                 java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        This method adds a new user to the waiting list and starts a ping daemon fr that player.
        Parameters:
        newUser - contains information about the new user
        currentCommandHandler - the command handler of the new user
        Throws:
        GameManager.AlreadyPlayingException - thrown if the user is already laying in some game
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - thrown if the waiting list contains more than five players

      • addUserToWaitingList

        public void addUserToWaitingList(UserData newUser,
                                 CommandHandler currentCommandHandler,
                                 boolean ping)
                          throws GameManager.AlreadyPlayingException,
                                 java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        This method adds a new user to the waiting list.
        Parameters:
        newUser - contains information about the new user
        currentCommandHandler - the command handler of the new user
        ping - true if the the GameManager needs to start a ping daemon for the new user
        Throws:
        GameManager.AlreadyPlayingException - thrown if the user is already laying in some game
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - thrown if the waiting list contains more than five players

      • getWaitingList

        public java.util.List<GameManager.Tuple> getWaitingList()
        Getter method for the waitingList attribute. Only for testing, should be avoided in production code.
        Returns:
        the list of player waiting for a game to be created

      • getPlayerCommandHandlerMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CommandHandler> getPlayerCommandHandlerMap()
        Getter method for the playerCommandHandlerMap attribute.
        Returns:
        a map that associates the nickname of a player with his commandHandler

      • getMapPreference

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMapPreference()
        Getter method for the mapPreference attribute.
        Returns:
        an index that represent the type of map chosen for the next game

      • getGameList

        public java.util.List<Game> getGameList()
        Getter method for the gameList attribute.
        Returns:
        list of games managed by the GameManager

      • setController

        public void setController(Controller controller)
        Setter method for the controller attribute. Sets the controller for every game.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller instance that will be used to handle every game managed by the GameManager
